content.raw: When we pass an empty string for the config, we load the default config. But in the case when we name specific plugins, we most likely don't want to load the default config as well. I'd propose we remove the config from the 3rd `Initialize` function, but I'm afraid that would make the usage less compact, because we wouldn't be able to use initializer lists for the plugins.
content.html: When we pass an empty string for the config, we load the default config. But in the case when we name specific plugins, we most likely don't want to load the default config as well. I'd propose we remove the config from the 3rd Initialize function, but I'm afraid that would make the usage less compact, because we wouldn't be able to use initializer lists for the plugins.
